item.title: Colophon
item.description:
This is the personal blog and web site of Julian West. More about Julian here. Site Disclosure here.

Hosting = Github Pages. Blog CMS is Hugo static site generator framework, running as a GitHub Pages workflow. Articles are typically drafted in Scrivener, archived in Day One journal. julianwest.me is best-viewed in a standards-compliant web browser (Safari or Chrome/Edge/etc). If youâ€™re using a recent browser and have problems navigating my site or blog, do let me know.
